item.title: Caddy Exercises
item.description: Caddy Exercises The Caddy exercises include deploying a React, Spring Boot, and .NET application using the caddy service. React Exercise Spring Boot Exercise .NET Exercise

item.title: Nginx Exercises
item.description: Nginx Exercises The Nginx exercises include deploying a React, Spring Boot, and .NET application using the nginx.service. React Exercise Spring Boot Exercise .NET Exercise
